title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.6 - Structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 51.6 - Structures

State Regulations
(a) No person shall
erect, construct, occupy or maintain a permanent structure, blind, stand or
platform without the written permission of the Regional Manager. (b) No person shall erect, construct, occupy
or maintain any structure that is affixed to a tree by nails, screws, or other
means that injure or damage the tree without the written permission of the

Regional Manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
51.6

Adopted

New

York State Register November 3, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 44, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
